message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to start our negotiation. I'm willing to offer you the product for $600,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $600,000 is a bit too high for me right now.  Would you consider $450,000?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go as low as $450,000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $550,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept for the product.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $550,000 is closer to what I had in mind, I'm still hoping to land a bit lower. Would you be open to $475,000?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $475,000. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $525,000. This is the highest price I'm willing to accept for the product.

Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this. $525,000 is getting close, but to be honest,  $500,000 is the absolute highest I can justify.  If we can make that work, I'm ready to close the deal.  What do you say?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $500,000. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $520,000. This is the highest price I'm willing to accept for the product.
